org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.client.authentication

Interface OAuthClientAuthenticator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.wso2.carbon.identity.core.handler.IdentityHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOAuthClientAuthenticator, BasicAuthClientAuthenticator, PublicClientAuthenticator

    public interface OAuthClientAuthenticator
extends org.wso2.carbon.identity.core.handler.IdentityHandler

    • Method Detail

      • authenticateClient

        boolean authenticateClient(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                           Map<String,List> bodyParams,
                           OAuthClientAuthnContext oAuthClientAuthnContext)
                    throws OAuthClientAuthnException
        Authenticate OAuth2 Client.
        Parameters:
        request - Incoming HttpServletRequest.
        bodyParams - Body parameter content of the incoming HttpRequest
        oAuthClientAuthnContext - OAuth2 Client Authenticaion Context
        Returns:
        Client authentication status. True if the client authentication is success. Else false.
        Throws:
        OAuthClientAuthnException

      • canAuthenticate

        boolean canAuthenticate(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                        Map<String,List> bodyParams,
                        OAuthClientAuthnContext oAuthClientAuthnContext)
        Returns whether the incoming reqeust can be handled by the particular authenticator.
        Parameters:
        request - Incoming HttpServletRequest.
        bodyParams - Content of the body parameters.
        oAuthClientAuthnContext - OAuth Client Authentication context.
        Returns:
        Whether the OAuth client can be authenticated or not by this authenticator.

      • getClientId

        String getClientId(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                   Map<String,List> bodyParams,
                   OAuthClientAuthnContext oAuthClientAuthnContext)
            throws OAuthClientAuthnException
        Extracts the OAuth client id from the incoming request.
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest which is the incoming request.
        bodyParams - Body parameter content of the incoming request.
        oAuthClientAuthnContext - OAuth Client Authentication Context.
        Returns:
        Client ID
        Throws:
        OAuthClientAuthnException
